goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
graph_title: Installed renewable energy-generating capacity in developing countries (in watts per capita)
indicator_name: Installed renewable energy-generating capacity in developing countries (in watts per capita)
target_name: By 2030, expand infrastructure and upgrade technology for supplying modern and sustainable energy services for all in developing countries, in particular least developed countries, small island developing States and landlocked developing countries, in accordance with their respective programmes of support
page_content:
**Integrated Indicator**

This indicator is considered integrated into [7.a target](/en/7)

ca.goal_meta_link_text: Metadades dels Objetius de Desenvolupament Sostenible de les Nacions Unides (pdf 894kB)
ca.indicator_definition: Inversions en eficiència energètica en proporció al PIB i a la quantia de la inversió estrangera directa en transferències financeres destinades a infraestructura i tecnologia per a serveis de desenvolupament sostenible
ca.page_content:
**Indicador integrat**

Aquest indicador es considera integrat a la [fita 7.a](/7)
